channel.title: Ansible on Fieryrival's Blog
channel.description: Recent content in Ansible on Fieryrival's Blog

item.title: Becoming the Authority: An AD CS Exploit on HTB 'Authority'
item.description: Walkthrough of a medium-rated Windows AD box involving LDAP manipulation, cracking an Ansible vault, and escalating to Domain Admin via the AD CS ESC1 exploit.

item.title: From Spring Boot LFI to Ansible Root: A Guide to HTB 'Inject'
item.description: Easy rated linux box from hackthebox with Springboot application for foothold and ansible for privilege escalation.
